p: The study was conducted to investigate the hypoglycemic, anti-diabetic, and anti-hyperlipidemic activity of the solvent fractions of Bersama abyssinica in normoglycemic and diabetic mice with the view to validating its traditional use in the management of DM in humans. DM is a medical condition that is characterized by a chronic increment of blood glucose level secondary to a relative/absolute shortage of insulin/resistance to the action of insulin. 35
